start.text: You wake up in a dark forest. The trees whisper. Paths stretch in every direction.

north.text: You find a ruined tower. A hooded figure watches you.

east.text: A river blocks your path. A boat is moored nearby.

figure.text: The figure gives you a glowing stone and vanishes. You feel a strange power.

boat.text: You cross safely and find a village of friendly folk.

village.text: The villagers welcome you. You decide to stay for a while.

endPower.text: The stone glows brightly. Time rewinds. You are back at the start... but changed.

hills.text: In the hills, you find a cave pulsing with dark energy. A voice calls your name.

caveEntrance.text: Inside, a cursed beast awakens. Only the Glowing Stone can weaken it...

defeatBeast.text: The stone shines brightly. The beast crumbles. Peace returns to the forest.

badEnding.text: You are no match. The beast devours all who come near. The forest remains cursed.

heroEnd.text: The villagers celebrate your return. Songs are sung of your bravery for generations.

lazyEnd.text: You enjoy your days in the village, ignoring the darkness growing outside.
